short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List of all the links you need at MV High School

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This cool extension create a pop up window with images of all the links you need. You can click on the images and they'll take you to the selected website.

Note: If you don't attend MVHS, this is probably not a recommended extension for you.
